Sportium - твой персональный гид в мире: Sportium - your personal guide to the world of fitness
Ты ставишь цель — мы выдаём готовую прог: You set the goal — we give you a ready-made weekly plan. Workouts, nutrition, and tips — all tailored to you, no fuss. Sign up and start your journey to the best version of yourself!
Вдохновляй и вдохновляйся результатами д: Inspire and be inspired by others' results
Прошёл весь план? Сбросил пару кило или: Finished your plan? Dropped a few kilos or boosted your endurance? Share your progress with friends right from your dashboard. Send a link to your plan, post a photo of your results, or just show off how awesome you are!
Зарегистрируйся и расскажи немного о себ: Sign up and tell us a bit about yourself: your age, height, weight, and your goal — whether it's to lose weight, gain muscle, or just stay in shape. We'll automatically create a program that's perfectly tailored to you.
Sportium создаст для вас детальный недел: Sportium will create a detailed weekly plan just for you — including workouts to follow and a personalized meal plan. Everything is tailored to your goals without the unnecessary routine — just follow the plan.
Хочешь заменить сложное упражнение или н: Do you want to replace a difficult exercise or don't like buckwheat? Just write about it in the chat. The system will take into account your wishes, adapt your recommendations, and create a new plan for the week. Everything is simple and convenient.
Данный проект разработан студентами ЛГТУ: This project was developed by students of LSTU as part of a hackathon for educational and research purposes.
Для доступа к системе пройдите быструю р: To access the system, go through a quick registration. This will unlock all the functions and features of the service.
Если вы уже с нами, просто войдите в сво: If you are already with us, just log in to your account. If not, it's time to register!
